roleset.name: to call on a telephone
roleset.note: DIAL-V NOTES: Frames file for 'dial' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from dial.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: When [a caller]-2 reaches Telelawyer by [*-2]dialing 900-TELELAW [*T*-1] , a receptionist refers the call to one of six attorneys .
